title: great eurostile-like design from 60s
content:
haha how's about this my typophile amigos?

extra points for identifiying the singer

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018022002im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Vivo_4592.jpg)
author: geraintf

comments.content:
What part of the world is this singer from?

The numerals look similar to [Handel Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018022002/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/handel-gothic/), except that the 4 is open. Apparently the font is too new anyway, but that's what it reminds me of.

- Mike Yanega
Looks like Elis Regina to me. She is still great to listen to.

And here are the words of what she was signing, "O Cantador" [http://meuwebsite.com.br/marciadp/cantador.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018022002/http:/meuwebsite.com.br/marciadp/cantador.html "http://meuwebsite.com.br/marciadp/cantador.html").

reminded me of this :)  
(from the House Industries blog)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018022002im_/http:/typophile.com/files/588_5245.jpg)

so we have a song identification! good work that man :)  
o cantador is on '20 anos de saudade' i think, will have to look that one up again. Thanks michel!

you're right mike, it does look like a precursor to handel gothic..
Perhaps a little closer would be [Digital Sans Medium](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018022002/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/digital-sans/)?
